reviewText: History of the ECW World Title DVD-R Set is one of the best things I've seen in years. You must buy this set.

Here's what you get:

Shane Douglas vs. 2 Cold Scorpio - Double Jeopardy 1994 1/5
This match is more well known for the shock afterwards of Shane throwing the NWA belt down (which is also on the dvd)

Shane Douglas vs. Sandman (Highlights)

Sandman vs. Shane Douglas - Hostile City Showdown 1995 3/5

Sandman vs. Cactus Jack (Barbed Wire Match) 1995 - 5/5 Awesome and brutal barbed wire match

Sandman vs. Cactus Jack (Shane Douglas is referee) - 1/5

Sandman vs. Mikey Whipwreck - Hardcore TV 10.28.95 (Ladders Match) - 2/5
(Rise & Fall of ECW)

Mikey Whipwreck vs. Steve Austin - November 2 Remember 1995 - 5/5
(Stone Cold Truth)

Mikey Whipwreck vs. Steve Austin vs. Sandman - December 2 Dismember 1995 5/5
(Life & Legacy of Stone Cold Steve Austin)

Sandman vs. Raven - ECW Hardcore TV 1.27.96 (Highlights)

Raven vs. Sandman - 1996 - 1/5

Raven vs. Shane Douglas - Hostile City Showdown 1996 - 3/5

Raven vs. Shane Douglas vs. Pitbull #2

Raven vs. Tommy Dreamer (Tokyo, Japan) Hardcore TV 8.11.96 5/5

Brian Lee/Stevie Richards vs. Tommy Dreamer/Sandman - Ultimate Jeopardy 1996 5/5

Raven vs. Sandman (Barbed Wire Match) (Video Clips Only) - Holiday Hell 1996
(Complete Match on ECW Extreme Evolution DVD)

Sandman vs. Terry Funk vs. Stevie Richards (Barely Legal 1997) 5/5
(ECW Bloodsport)

Raven vs. Terry Funk (Barely Legal 1997) 2/5
(ECW Bloodsport)

Terry Funk vs. Sabu (Barbed Wire Match) (Born to Be Wired 1997) 5/5
(ECW Bloodsport)

Sabu vs. Shane Douglas vs. Terry Funk (Hardcore Heaven 1997) 4/5

Shane Douglas vs. Bam Bam Bigelow (Hardcore TV 10.16.97) 2/5

Bam Bam Bigelow vs. Shane Douglas (November 2 Remember 1997) 3/5

Shane Douglas vs. Tazz (Guilty As Charged 1999) 4/5

Tazz vs. Sabu (Living Dangerously 1999) 4/5
(ECW Extreme Rules)

Tazz vs. Mike Awesome vs. Masato Tanaka (ECW Anarchy Rulz 1999) 4/5

Mike Awesome vs. Masato Tanaka (ECW on TNN) 3/5

Masato Tanaka vs. Mike Awesome (ECW on TNN 12.31.99) 5/5
(ECW Extreme Rules)

Mike Awesome vs. Tazz (Fancam) (ECW 4.13.00) 5/5

Tommy Dreamer vs. Justin Credible (ECW Cyberslam 2000) 2/5

Justin Credible vs. Jerry Lynn (ECW Anarchy Rulz 2000) 3/5

Justin Credible vs. Jerry Lynn vs. Sandman vs. Steve Corino (November 2 Remember 2000) 3/5

Steve Corino vs. Justin Credible vs. Sandman (Guilty As Charged 2001)
(ECW Extreme Rules)

Sandman vs. Rhino (Guilty As Charged 2001) Watch Rhyno slip when he delivers the gore
